verbs.description: hearty homemade spaghetti sauce after years of [V: experimenting] my mom has perfected her hearty spaghetti sauce recipe it excellent served with a tossed salad and garlic bread although the recipe makes more than two servings it freezes well —jennifer shaw fond du lac wisconsin
